questions.question: Out of the following which detector works on the principle: the nuclear radiations passing through the gas produces ionization?
Which of the following is not a type of radiation detectors?
In a Geiger-Muller counter tube which one of the following is correct?

answers.a: Central thin wire is cathode and cylindrical tube is anode
answers.b: Central thin wire is anode and cylindrical tube is cathode

questions.question: For ionization and quenching respectively, The Geiger-Muller counter uses
